doc.title: Hello Darkness
doc.plot: Hello Darkness is the story of a working class vampire who develops a taste for blue blood. Mark Cooper hit his prime in the early 1960's and as a result of his "conversion" never left it. He still lives an ordinary life; working a night shift, paying the bills, taking out the bins, while having to deal, in a very practical way, with all the exigencies of vampire lore - from avoiding sunlight to drinking blood to confronting eternity.
